title: Pattern Raw Storage Object
description: Canonical in-memory/raw object form of a saved pattern. On disk today, patterns are persisted as comma-separated hex text; this schema models the equivalent structured form.

items.description: Hex color token. RRGGBB implies opaque; AARRGGBB includes alpha.

$comment: Semantic invariant from code: colors.length must equal size*size and be a perfect square set for successful load.
